headline: Schlumberger: There Are Better Choices In The Oil And Gas Industry
summary: Schlumberger thrives despite market challenges, with tech innovation, diverse revenue streams, and strong growth metrics. Click to read why SLB stock is a Hold.

headline: Report: Baker Hughes Achieves Nearly 40% Reduction in Operational Emissions Intensity While Maintaining Profitable Growth
summary: * Company achieved 39.5% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions intensity for scopes 1 and 2 from the 2019 base year* 2024 corporate sustainability report announces 29.3% absolute reductions in scope...
